story-telling.title: BOLD STORYTELLING AT THE INTERSECTION OF SPORTS, EMOTION, AND ART
story-telling.text: Mathis Lenorais is the creative mind behind Clere Visuals, capturing sports and movement through photography and art. Not fast enough to compete at the professional level, he channels his energy into freezing emotions, intensity, and fleeting moments in every shot. With a passion for dynamic visual storytelling, he transforms moments into images that inspire, move, and leave a lasting impression.
